ing: 1 (8 ounce) package PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese, softened
des: "The procrastinator's dream recipe: 10 minutes to party time is all you need to turn 5 ingredients into a savory app. Better snag a scoop quickly-these bites won't last long."
ins:
Spread cream cheese onto bottom of shallow bowl.
Toss shrimp with cocktail sauce; spoon over cream cheese.
Top with remaining ingredients. Serve with WHEAT THINS Original Snacks.
